Biography

CAREER COLLEGIATE RESULTS

One of the top distance runners in the country ... His body of work includes an absolute school record in the 3000 meters (7:42.51) as well as indoor school records in the mile (3:53.85) and the 5000 meters (13:21.20) ... Anchored the 4xMile relay squad which recorded the second-fastest time in world history of 15:51.91 at the 2024 Penn Relays ... The lineup consisted of Sean Donoghue, Charlie O'Donovan, Marco Langon and Murphy ... Anchored the relay in 3:54.32 as Villanova set a collegiate, Penn Relays, BIG EAST and school record ... Part of school records in the 4xMile and distance medley (9:20.44) relays ... Holds BIG EAST Championships and Villanova Stadium records in the 1500 meters (3:39.00), the 5000 meters (13:43.32) and the 4x800 meter relay (7:17.96) ... Five-time All-American and eight-time BIG EAST champion ... Owns 11 career All-BIG EAST honors and has anchored three Championship of America winning races at the Penn Relays ... His top national finishes are fourth place in the 3000 meters (2024 indoor), 11th in the 1500 meters (2023 outdoor, 2024 outdoor) and 14th in cross country (2023) ... In addition to the records he holds he ranks second overall in school history in the 1500 meters and the 5000 meters, as well as third in the mile ... His fourth place NCAA finish in the 3000 meters in 2024 ws the best by a Wildcats athlete in 21 years ... Named the Collegiate Men's Athlete of the Meet in the track events at the Penn Relays in 2024 ... Selected as the Outstanding Track Performer at the BIG EAST Championships both indoors and outdoors in 2024 ... Two-time USTFCCCA Mid-Atlantic Region Athlete of the Year in cross country (2022, 2023) ... Has won the NCAA Mid-Atlantic Regional individual title each of the last two years ... In 2023 was the BIG EAST individual champion and had the highest finish from the Mid-Atlantic Region with a 14th place showing at the NCAA Championships ... Anchored a Penn Relays Championship of America title in the 4xMile relay in 2023 … Helped lead Villanova to cross country team titles at the BIG EAST Championships and the NCAA Mid-Atlantic Regional in 2022 … Graduated from Villanova in May 2024 as an Economics major with a minor in Communication ... Named one of two winners of a Villanova Senior Student-Athlete of the Year Award in 2023-24 ... Two-time selection to the BIG EAST All-Academic Team and three-time member of the Athletic Director's Honor Roll.

BEFORE VILLANOVA

Allentown High School: Earned seven varsity letters in track & field and two in cross country in addition to playing midfield on the soccer team and point guard on the basketball team … Top individual events on the track were the 1600 meters and the 3200 meters … Was an All-American and the Gatorade New Jersey Cross Country Athlete of the Year in cross country as a senior … Finished eighth at the New Balance Nationals in cross country his senior year … Four-time individual champion at the New Jersey Meet of Champions … Qualifier for the Brooks PR Invitational in 2019 … Named the Outstanding Male Athlete in the Class of 2020 … High school PRs included times of 4:11 in the 1600 meters and 8:54 in the 3200 meters.

Personal: Born 4/2/02 in Millstone, N.J. … Youngest of three children of Thomas and Christine Murphy … Has two older siblings, Conor (27) and Kiera (25) … Brother, Conor, was a member of the track & field and cross country teams at Rutgers from 2015-20 … Enjoys spending time with friends and listening to music in addition to being active and playing outdoor sports … Chose to attend Villanova for its proximity to home and the opportunity to attend an elite university with great academic and athletics programs … Noted the coaching staff, the close-knit team and the program’s history of success as deciding factors … Has yet to declare a major.
